page.title: 08A PUPIL'S DAY IN HOUNSLOW
page.content: 7.00 Alarm goes off. Have a bath. 7.20 Get dressed. Prepare for{school. 7.35 Have a cup of coffee. 8.00 Leave home for school. 8.45 Arrive at school. 9.00 Registration. 9.10 First lesson, Metalwork. 10.20 Breaktime, go outside and play. 10.40 Second lesson, Science. 11.50 Eat my packed lunch. 1.00 Third lesson. Maths. 2.10 Breaktime, go outside and play. 2.25 Fourth lesson, English. 3.35 Go home,{Hurray! 4.00 I get in and do my{homework. 5.12 Mum gets in. 5.18 Feed the dogs. 5.20 Watch TV. 6.00 We have dinner. 6.30 Go to the park and play. 8.30 Go home and get ready for bed. 9.00 Bedtime zzzzzzzzzzzzzzz!
